Question.Subject: Can the Magic Jack be used from outside the US? If yes, how?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Hi there. I think you can make free calls in the US & Canada, outside you will pay international fees. I recently wrote about this - http://nut.bz/1gho0w.k Check it out, it has info which i pulled from the internet but things might have changed so your best bet will be to get into contact with the company that sell these. Best off luck ;-)
